definition: many superficial changes but no departure from the original stand (idiom); plus ça change, plus ça reste la mème chose
pinyin: wan4 bian4 bu4 li2 qi2 zong1

definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: Complicated as it seems, English grammar has its basic rules.
sentences.chinese: 英語語法看似繁複無比，其實萬變不離其宗。

sentences.english: Ten thousand become and don't leave its, hold tight inside because of, release the result.
sentences.chinese: 萬變不離其宗，抓住內因，推出結果。
